title: B Split Star Placements Through Mid
description: Place your stars like this when doing a B Split.

title: Standard B Site Execute Nebula Placements
description: Here are the default smokes for a B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

title: Hold B Main and B Tower Like This
description: Use your Nebulas, Gravity Wells, and Nova pulses like this to hold down important chokepoints into B Site and B Tower by using the different variations shown in this video.

title: Hold A Main and A Tower Like This
description: Use your Nebulas, Gravity Wells and Nova Pulse like this to hold A Ramp and A Tower.

title: Aggressive Catwalk Push Nebula
description: Use these Nebula to take space in mid, push up Catwalk, and either pressure or push into A Site through Tree with your team.

title: Standard B Site Execute Sky Smokes
description: Here are the default smokes for a B Site execute. Follow how the smokes are placed on screen to best limit the Defender's options.

title: Early Round Support in Mid for Duelists with Nebula
description: Use one of these Nebula variations to support your team's efforts to hold deeper sightlines into Mid and look for picks on Attackers peeking into Mid.

title: A Site B Site Chokepoint Hold Using Full Utility
description: Use all of your standard pieces of utility to hold down the B Main chokepoint, or at least break up the Attackers push into B Site.

title: B Site Chokepoint Hold Using Full Utility
description: Use all of your standard pieces of utility to hold down the B Main chokepoint, or at least break up the Attackers push into B Site.

title: A Nest to A Default Cosmic Divide
description: This is a good cosmic divide to cut off the front of A Site from the back of A Site allowing your teammate to plant the bomb.

title: B Site Cosmic Divide
description: This is a good cosmic divide to separate the front of B Site and the back of B Site.

title: A Nest to A Site Corner Nova Pulse
description: This is a good nova pulse to concuss enemies playing in A Ramp Corner allowing you to swing and get a frag.

title: B Green to B Site Nebula
description: This is a good nebula combo to block off all angles on B Site allowing your teammate to plant the bomb without being seen.

title: A Nest to A Pipes Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to block a common angle that people like to op. Placing your smoke ontop of A Pipes allow you to block the angle and push up with your team and execute the site.

title: B Green Dissipate Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to dissipate to sneak up B Green and allow you to successfully get a flank off.

title: B Green Gravity Well
description: This is a good gravity well lineup to clear both of the corners at the box of B Green.

title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to block off mid boiler and allow your team to take control of middle.

title: A Site Nova Pulse
description: This a good nova pulse to concuss an enemy playing on A Site allowing you to get a pick and take A Site.

title: A Nest to A Generator Gravity Well
description: This is a good gravity well to pull enemies out of the generator corner of A Site and allow you to get a quick and easy kill.

title: Mid Boiler to Mid Blue Nebula
description: This is a good nebula for Mid Blue to pull smoke off enemies and delay a mid push.

title: B Green Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to create a one-way smoke on-top of B Green.

title: A Site Cosmic Divide
description: This is a good cosmic divide for A Site that allows you to cut off enemies protecting the bomb.

title: A Screens to A Default Gravity Well
description: This is a good gravity well to pull enemies off the bomb or stop a plant.

title: A Site to A Pipes Gravity Well
description: This is a good gravity well for A Pipes to stop a push onto A Site.

title: B Site Retake Cosmic Divide
description: This is a good cosmic divide location to prevent the enemies from hearing the defuse. This will also make it so if enemies want to peek you they will have to cross through the wall giving you ample time to stop defusing and shoot back.

title: A Site to A Pipes Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to create a one-way smoke on A Pipes. This will allow you to get an advantageous angle on your opponent.

title: B Site to B Green Nebula
description: This is a good nebula to one-way smoke B Green and allow you to get an advantageous angle on your enemies pushing up.

title: A Metal Doors Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo
description: This is useful for forcing players out from behind A Metal Doors, and if they are hit by both the Nova pulse and the Gravity Well they will be forced out into an extremely vulnerable position.

title: A Hall / A Rope To Left A Lever Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo
description: This is useful for forcing players out from behind the corner on the left side of A Lever.

title: Nebula For Above / Below A Bridge
description: This is useful for blocking vision on A Bridge and below A Bridge. Make sure to place the smoke in the dead center of the front-most part of the bridge so that players cannot peek out of the smoke in any way, and have to use the most utility possible, and apply the most effort possible, while being at the highest disadvantage, to be able to push out of or peek out of the smoke.

title: One-Off Two Person A Site Setup To Punish Overly Aggressive Teams
description: This two person one-off setup for A Site can be a useful way to catch players off guard, especially if they don't tend to place a smoke in-between the Pyramids.

title: Front B Site Nebula Lurk Eco Strat
description: This is a risky but potentially rewarding eco strat, that may be hit or miss depending on how the enemy team responds to this play. This strat can turn the tide of a round in your team's favor, or do damage to the enemy team's economy.

title: A Hall Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo For Inner A Hall Lurker
description: This is useful for pulling players out from the inner A Hall corner on the side of the Attackers.

title: Nebula One-Way To Peek Mid Pillar From Mid Nest
description: This is useful for stopping players from peeking Mid Nest from the side of Mid Pillar that is closest to B Elbow. Be careful when using this though since players can easily peek you from B Elbow if your teammates are not stopping the Attackers from pushing out of B Elbow into Mid Top.

title: Star Placement Setup For B Main Choke Point Into B Site Combo With Killjoy
description: This Astra / Killjoy Utility Combo Setup for the B Main / B Site chokepoint is useful for making it difficult for the Attackers to push into B Site, since it is so difficult to get through this choke point and they either take lots of damage or become unable to push through this chokepoint after some of their teammates get picked off.

title: Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo For Behind Tall Bricks On Cave Side A Site
description: This is useful for forcing players out from behind the tall bricks on Cave side of A Site Post-Plant.

title: B Main Anti-Post Plant Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo
description: This is useful for stopping players from setting up Post-Plant lineups from behind the cover on the right side of B Main when looking into B Main from B Site.

title: Full Utility A Site Execute
description: Here's a simple, but effective full utility execute for A Site.

title: B Site Post Plant Gravity Well to Delay Pocket Spike Defuse
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to delay enemy players from defusing the spike.

title: A Site Post Plant Gravity Well to Delay Spike Defuse
description: Here's a simple, but effective way to delay enemy players from defusing the spike.
